      • getSystemsLocale

        public static Locale getSystemsLocale()
        Returns the system's Locale (as determined by the JVM at startup, Locale.getDefault()). Should be used to show locale dependent information in the system's locale.

        Note: The default locale is overridden with the ZAP's user defined locale/language.

        Returns:
        the system's Locale
        See Also:
        Locale.setDefault(Locale)

      • isKali

        public static boolean isKali()
        Tells whether or not ZAP is running in Kali (and it's not a daily build).
        Returns:
        true if running in Kali (and it's not daily build), false otherwise
